dashboard.title: Workforce MSK Health Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Monitor and manage your team's musculoskeletal health

trends.title: Monthly Trends
trends.painReductionDesc: The Pain Reduction line displays the average pain improvement percentage for each month based on when follow-up responses and program endings were reported. The higher the percentage, the better the pain reduction results.
trends.programCompletionDesc: The Program Completion line describes month-to-month change in newly Ended Programs compared to previous month.
trends.exerciseComplianceDesc: The Exercise Compliance line describes what % of employees has completed their weekly goals, in a given month. The data updates every week on Monday.

riskAnalysis.title: Risk Analysis by Department
riskAnalysis.employeesTooltip: The data displays Active users and updates in real time.
riskAnalysis.avgPainLevelTooltip: The maximum pain level is 10 (worst), the minimum pain level is 0 (best). The data updates every day at midnight.
riskAnalysis.highRiskTooltip: The data displays what % out of department's employees are at high risk of musculoskeletal disorder, based on OREBRO Questionnaire results.

exerciseEngagement.title: Pain Program Engagement
exerciseEngagement.completedExercisesDescription: The Completed Exercises displays how many exercises employees clicked as "exercised" in a given period. This provides clues about employee exercise adherence and suggest if they need some push (e.g. campaign, motivation, help).
exerciseEngagement.completedProgramsDescription: This progress bar displays the ended programs vs. active programs for a given period. The data updates immediately.
exerciseEngagement.weeklyGoalsDescription: This progress bar displays completed weekly goals vs. active goals for this period. The data updates in a real time.

fitnessEngagement.title: Fitness & Wellbeing Engagement
fitnessEngagement.startedProgramsDescription: The Started Programs displays how many wellness programs employees have initiated. This provides insights into employee engagement with preventive wellness activities.
fitnessEngagement.mostPopularProgramsDescription: Shows the most popular secondary wellness programs based on how many times employees have started each program type.

myProfile.title: My Profile
myProfile.uploadPicture: Upload picture or drag and drop

companyProfile.title: Company Profile
companyProfile.uploadLogo: Upload logo or drag and drop

actionRoom.title: Action Room
actionRoom.subtitle: Take strategic actions to improve your workforce wellbeing
actionRoom.createCampaignDescription: Create a custom campaign and increase the health awareness of your workforce.
actionRoom.happyToPrepare: sure, I'll be happy to prepare the campaign for you!
actionRoom.whatTopics: What topics do you want me to focus on?
actionRoom.pebeeIWantYou: Pebee, I want you to focus on:
actionRoom.giveMeSeconds: Give me a few seconds to prepare a nice and functional campaign for you. When created, preview the campaign and let me know if you are satisfied or ready to download and distribute.
actionRoom.pleaseConfirm: Please, confirm to create the campaign.
actionRoom.weHaveIdentified: We have been able to identify
actionRoom.invitationToAll: invitation to all high risk employees and ask them what they need.
actionRoom.utilizePowerDescription: Utilize the power of one of the most effective prevention pain and disability actions: workspace rotation. Set a regular workplace circulation reminder, so you can consult the possible rotation with your HSE and Manufacturing managers.
actionRoom.rotationReminderText: this is a rotation reminder. The rotation date is upcoming in [days_to_rotation] days.
actionRoom.coordinateManagers: Coordinate with HSE and Manufacturing managers
actionRoom.scheduleImplement: Schedule and implement the rotation plan

helpHighRiskMessage.title: WE WANT TO HELP YOU
helpHighRiskMessage.body:
Based on the results of the completed OREBRO questionnaire, we have been notified that you are at high risk of absenteeism and musculoskeletal disorders.

We value your health, so if you want to look for solutions to your condition with us, we will be happy if you contact the HR department and we will work together to find optimal solutions to your condition.

Thank you for being part of our company.
{{firstName}} {{lastName}}.
helpHighRiskMessage.footer: *This message is encrypted and sent from the Pebee therapist application. The employer cannot track your data and the message is completely anonymous.
